Construction of New Library Building

Reference: TENDER-UT-2023-087 | College of Business and Commerce

Closes in 3 days

Tender Details

Estimated Budget: $2,500,000

Category: Civil Engineering

Published Date: August 1, 2023

Submission Deadline: August 30, 2023, 5:00 PM

Bid Opening Date: September 5, 2023, 10:00 AM

Project Duration: 18 months

Project Description

Construction of a 5-story library building with modern facilities, reading rooms, digital resource center, and administrative offices. The building will have a total area of 25,000 square feet and will include advanced technological infrastructure for digital learning.

Scope of Work
  • Site preparation and foundation work
  • Structural construction of 5-story building
  • Electrical and plumbing installations
  • HVAC system installation
  • Interior finishing and furnishings
  • Landscaping and external works
  • IT infrastructure implementation
Eligibility Criteria
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in similar projects
  • Annual turnover of at least $5 million
  • Valid contractor license
  • Proof of successful completion of at least 3 similar projects

Location & Site Details

Campus Map - Library Construction Site

Site Information

Address: College of Business and Commerce, 123 Education Blvd, Capital City

Plot Number: LT-45-B

Total Area: 35,000 sq. ft.

Current Status: Cleared and prepared for construction

Access: Main campus entrance, near administration building

Site Visits: Scheduled for August 20-22, 2023
